p: Meta-analysis was performed on the eligible data to determine the prevalence of HIV/HCV, HIV/HBV, HCV/HBV, HIV/HCV/HBV, HIV, HCV and HBV in PWID and FSWs. A chi-square test was used to investigate the heterogeneity of the studies. The heterogeneity results from random-effects model were used to analyze the data at 95% confidence level. The MetaProp command was used to estimate the prevalence.
